live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50040.summary: Some customers in Ear Falls and Goldpines are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50040.title: May 28 - Ear Falls & Goldpines| All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
